Clinical Requirements
All clinical must be completed with a nurse practitioner, physician assistant or a physician. Hospitals are not recommended locations for this clinical experience. Clinics and/or doctor's offices are preferred. Please allow sufficient time for study and preparation for each appointment with the preceptor. Before each appointment plan to do the following:
  • Complete two open book exams
  • Review two instructional videos
Breakdown of time spent on clinical learning activities:
  • Spend 4 - 6 hours weekly with the preceptor
  • Spend a mandatory total of 48 hours with the preceptor
  • Spend up to 52 hours producing documents like a clinical journal, patient charting, and other supporting materials; which include:
    • Completion of a health history on an individual of student's choice
    • Cultural assessment on individual of student's choice
During the 48 hours with the preceptor, many physical assessment will be completed, but the documentation of only two patients for each system is required to be submitted in jouranl entries. Remember to keep the patient's anonymous and uphold their privacy law rights. (See the NURS 327 course content on I-Learn for complete instructions.)
